source:
-- Załadowanie danych z warstwy Silver do tabeli Delta
-- Tworzenie tabel Delta w warstwie Silver
CREATE OR REPLACE TABLE silver.d_products
USING DELTA
LOCATION 'abfss://silver@bigpharma.dfs.core.windows.net/d_products';

CREATE OR REPLACE TABLE silver.d_regions
USING DELTA
LOCATION 'abfss://silver@bigpharma.dfs.core.windows.net/d_customers';

-- Tworzenie tabel w warstwie Gold
CREATE OR REPLACE TABLE gold.d_products_gold
USING DELTA
LOCATION 'abfss://gold@bigpharma.dfs.core.windows.net/d_products';

CREATE OR REPLACE TABLE gold.d_regions_gold
USING DELTA
LOCATION 'abfss://gold@bigpharma.dfs.core.windows.net/d_regions';

-- Zmiana nazw kolumn w tabeli d_products i zapis do warstwy Gold
INSERT OVERWRITE TABLE gold.d_products_gold
SELECT 
    product_id AS IdProduct,
    product_name AS Name,
    brand_name AS Brand,
    sub_brand_name AS SubBrand,
    category_name AS Category
FROM silver.d_products;

-- Wybór odpowiednich kolumn w tabeli d_regions, zmiana nazw kolumn i zapis do warstwy Gold
INSERT OVERWRITE TABLE gold.d_regions_gold
SELECT 
    country_id AS IDCountry,
    cluster AS Claster,
    region_description AS Region,
    country AS Country
FROM silver.d_regions;

-- Usuwanie duplikatów w tabeli d_regions i zapis do nowej tabeli Gold
CREATE OR REPLACE TABLE gold.d_regions_gold_unique
USING DELTA
AS
SELECT DISTINCT 
    country_id AS IDCountry,
    cluster AS Claster,
    region_description AS Region,
    country AS Country
FROM silver.d_regions;
